products.title: Amor Vibrant Pink Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Amor Vibrant Pink Vertical Blind
products.productdescription: Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.  This blind can be made upto 400cm wide - much wider than all other blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style. All of our blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the British Blind and Shutter Association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.makeitsafe.org.uk to find out more. All control chains supplied with our vertical blinds will be approximately half the length of the drop. If you require a longer control chain, please get in touch once ordered and we can amend this for you.

products.title: Amor Salmon Pink Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Amor Salmon Pink Vertical Blind
products.productdescription: Sweet as bubblegum and happy as a clam, the Amor Salmon Pink is such a cheery accessory to any room. You will love it so much that from the day you put it up in your nursery it will be a slow and steady descent into pink madness until, one day, you wake up naked in a candy floss machine wondering how you let it get so bad. But that's ok! Because this pink works perfectly with neutral colours such as whites or dark greys as a loud, colourful statement piece that you physically can't tear your eyes from.  Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.  This blind can be made upto 400cm wide - much wider than all other blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style. All of our blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the British Blind and Shutter Association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.makeitsafe.org.uk to find out more. All control chains supplied with our vertical blinds will be approximately half the length of the drop. If you require a longer control chain, please get in touch once ordered and we can amend this for you.

products.title: Burst Champagn Pink Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Burst Champagn Pink Vertical Blind
products.productdescription: A gorgeous off-white tone with just the ever so slightest pink tinge, like a bottle of pink champagne, you will find that this blind is the perfect way to balance darkly coloured environments and give a strong contrast that doesn't overwhelm. Illuminated from behind you will get a warm white glow with the softest rose tint that floods the room with a slightly romantic vibe.  Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.  This blind can be made upto 400cm wide - much wider than all other blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style.

products.title: Splash Rosewood Pink 89mm Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Rosewood Pink 89mm Vertical Blind in Pink. Made to measure from £9.70 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This 89mm Vertical Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our Splash Rosewood Pink vertical blinds are contemporary and stylish.  A moisture-resistant fabric with a beautiful pink hue, makes this blind a great addition to a kitchen or bathroom.  With a variety of control and stacking options available on our headrails, this blind can be easily tailored to work for any window. At Swift Direct Blinds, with fifty years of blind making experiance, quality comes first.  This bespoke vertical blind comes with a 5 year guarantee, giving extra assurance that you are investing in piece that will stand the test of time

products.title: Splash Lipstick Pink 89mm Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Lipstick Pink 89mm Vertical Blind in Pink. Made to measure from £9.70 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This 89mm Vertical Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
This stylish pink vertical blind brightens any room . Vertical blinds add a stylish, modern look and this light-filtering, dim-out vertical blind is the perfect choice whether you are refreshing a tired looking window or moving into a new home. As a simple plain fabric, this bright pink vertical blind is especially great for adding a splash of colour in kitchens, as this fabric is also moisture-resistant!  Our quality made to measure vertical blinds are a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control. Whether its fully closed, binge-watching the latest riveting TV drama, or letting the light in (but keeping your privacy), our vertical blinds are great for privacy and light control.Coming with sleek white components and quality-checked by our blind experts, quality is paramount.  At Swift Direct Blinds with over 50 years making and selling blinds under our belt, not only is this vertical blind made by the experts,  it also comes with a fabulous five year guarantee - extra assurance that you are investing in quality that will stand the test of time.

products.title: Bella Blackout Rosewood Pink 89mm Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Bella Blackout Rosewood Pink 89mm Vertical Blind in Pink. Made to measure from £14.14 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This 89mm Vertical Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
This soft Bella Blackout Rosewood Pink vertical blind brings warm-toned splash of rose pink to your room.  This blind reduces light through its blackout properties, making this quality made to measure vertical blind a perfect addition to any room that needs optimum light control. Whether its fully closed, binge-watching the latest riveting TV drama, or letting the light in (but keeping your privacy), our vertical blinds are great for privacy for bedroom, living room or office!Our best-selling Bella Blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home!At Swift Direct Blinds, we take quality seriously. Not only are we situated in the heart of the Yorkshire textile industry, but our own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country. This gorgeous pink vertical blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by our blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service.

products.title: Keavy Dusky Pink
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Keavy Dusky Pink Standard Vertical Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Standard Vertical Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
Min Width: 250mm Max Width: 5000mm
 	Min Drop: 500mm Max Drop: 4000mm
 	Fabric Composition: Polyester
 	Louvre Width: 89mm
 	Guarantee: 12 Months
 	Fittings: Included
 	Controls: Cord control to open/close and beaded chain to tilt louvres, or wand control to open/close and twist wand to tilt louvres.
 	Stack: A choice of left, right or split.
 	Louvres: Louvres are supplied with top hangers and are available with bottom weights with stabilising chain or chainless bottom weights.
